prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with soft pink scales and long flowing fins.
Imagine a gentle, aquatic creature that heals other Pokemon with its charm and grace.
Generate a design for a Pokemon that embodies kindness and tranquility in its appearance.
Show me a sweet and nurturing Pokemon that thrives in oceanic environments.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a fish but has the ability to heal its friends.
Design a serene water-type Pokemon that features large, delicate fins and a friendly smile.
Give me an idea for a pink, playful Pokemon that loves to play in the water.
